collation.p: 17 quires of mostly 10 leaves each, marked with catchwords and with signatures at the end. Quires no. 23, 24 are incomplete. The first 9 quires are missing entirely.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Italian semi-cursive scripts of the 14th to 15th century.
